INSERT INTO [10.1.13.61].FRT_Customer.dbo.FRTSMSCRM (SODocNum, CustomerCodeB1, CustomerName, PhoneNumber, SMSContent, System, Remark, CreatedDate, Status, Account)
SELECT '0', '0', 'bts', L.Phone, L.SMSContent, 'POS', N'SMS gui voucher BTS', GETDATE(), 'A', 'FRTCSKH1' FROM [10.96.254.34].POS_HNI.dbo.log_voucher_bts L WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Phone ='$CURSOR$'
